snippet.title: Octodad Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Download and play the game free at http://OctodadGame.com Octodad is a third person adventure game about destruction, deception, and fatherhood. The player controls Octodad, a dapper octopus masquerading as a human, as he goes about a day of his life. His existence is a constant struggle, as he must master mundane tasks with his unwieldy boneless tentacles while simultaneously keeping his cephalopodian nature a secret from his human family.

This is the official trailer for Octodad, a game created by the DePaul Game Experience team at DePaul University's College of Computing & Digital Media in Chicago. Octodad is a submission for the 2011 Independent Games Festival Student Showcase. 

Octodad's website: http://OctodadGame.com

Octodad's facebook: 
http://www.facebook.com/pages/Octodad/163497377009211

Octodad's twitter: http://twitter.com/octodadgame

The DePaul Game Experience is:

Brian O'Donnell - Lead Programmer
Philip Tibitoski - Gameplay Programmer
Devon Scott-Tunkin - Graphics Programmer
Shervin Hossein - Gameplay/UI Programmer
Kevin Geisler - Systems Engineer
Philip Ono - UI Programmer
Nick Esparza - Lead Artist/UI Designer
Benjamin Canfield - Lead of Visual Design
Chris Stallman - Concept Artist/Animator
Kyle Hewitt - Environmental Artist
Pil Chang - 3D Character Artist
Jake Anderson - Lead Designer
Kyle Marks - Level Designer
Greg Mladucky - Level Designer
Majdi Badri - Level/Tutorial Designer
Seth Parker - Sound Design Lead/Composer
John Murphy - Producer
Megan O'Malley - Web Design
Kevin Zuhn - Project Lead

"Octopus I Love You" used with permission from and performed by Dalmation Rex and the Eigentones.

The Octodad trailer was edited by lead artist Nick Esparza.

Find out more about the DePaul Game Development program at http://GameDev.DePaul.edu
